Creator: Matania, Fortunino, 1881-1963, artist
Description: Black and white illustration depicts standing "Britisher" Soldier with  bandaged arm being interrogated by a German officer. Other officers listen from a nearby table and an armed soldier stands nearby. Text above and  below the illustration.
